name: PHVS_EventType_IIS
title: Event Type (IIS)
description: HL7-defined Table 0003 - Event type [only selected values listed] (use in MSH-9, second component). This code indicates the trigger event. Refer to Chapter 3, Version 2.5.1 for further information on HL7 event triggers.

concept.display: QBP - Query by parameter requesting an RSP segment pattern response
RSP - Segment pattern response in response to QBP^Q11
